statements: SELECT * FROM residents WHERE resident_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM residents WHERE communication_preference = 'email';
SELECT resident_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM residents WHERE resident_id > 5 ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM residents WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY resident_id ASC;
SELECT resident_id, first_name, last_name, communication_preference FROM residents WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM residents WHERE communication_preference='email' ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM residents WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY resident_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, address FROM residents WHERE communication_preference='phone' AND last_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM residents WHERE communication_preference IN ('email', 'sms') AND address LIKE '%Ave%' ORDER BY resident_id ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM residents WHERE communication_preference='sms' ORDER BY resident_id DESC, email ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Residents;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Residents;
SELECT last_name, email, phone_number FROM Residents WHERE communication_preference = 'Email';
SELECT * FROM OutreachCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_date FROM OutreachCampaigns WHERE campaign_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Residents;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Residents WHERE communication_preference = 'Email';
SELECT * FROM Residents WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, campaign_name FROM Residents LEFT JOIN OutreachCampaigns ON Residents.resident_id = OutreachCampaigns.organizer_id;
SELECT DISTINCT communication_preference FROM Residents ORDER BY communication_preference DESC;
SELECT * FROM residents
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM residents
SELECT * FROM outreach_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT campaign_name, organizer_id FROM outreach_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT organizer_name, organizer_email FROM organizer
SELECT * FROM residents;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM residents WHERE communication_preference = 'Email';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM outreach_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT r.first_name, r.last_name, o.organizer_name FROM residents r JOIN organizer o ON r.resident_id = o.organizer_id;
SELECT r.first_name, r.last_name, r.email, c.campaign_name FROM residents r JOIN outreach_campaigns c ON r.resident_id = c.organizer_id;
SELECT * FROM residents;
SELECT resident_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM residents;
SELECT * FROM outreach_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM outreach_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_name ASC;
SELECT resident_id, interaction_type, outcome FROM interactions WHERE outcome IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM residents WHERE communication_preference = 'Email' ORDER BY last_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM residents WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' AND communication_preference = 'Phone';

SELECT r.first_name, r.last_name, c.campaign_name, i.interaction_date FROM residents r JOIN interactions i ON r.resident_id = i.resident_id JOIN outreach_campaigns c ON i.campaign_id = c.campaign_id WHERE i.interaction_type = 'Meeting';
SELECT * FROM residents WHERE first_name IN ('John', 'Jane', 'Alice') ORDER BY first_name ASC, last_name DESC;

SELECT o.organizer_id, o.first_name, o.last_name, COUNT(i.interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM community_organizers o LEFT JOIN interactions i ON o.organizer_id = i.resident_id GROUP BY o.organizer_id ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM Residents;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM Residents WHERE communication_preference = 'Email';
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_type FROM OutreachCampaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ContactLogs ORDER BY contact_date DESC;
SELECT volunteer_id, first_name, last_name FROM Volunteers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM Residents;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM Residents WHERE communication_preference = 'Email';
SELECT * FROM OutreachCampaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT Residents.first_name, Volunteers.first_name FROM Residents INNER JOIN Volunteers ON Residents.resident_id = Volunteers.volunteer_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_participations FROM VolunteersParticipation WHERE participation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
